root.name: Pro Wrestling X
root.description: OverviewPro Wrestling X is an in development PC game that aims to bring back the game play style of the Wrestling games developed mainly for the N64 by syn Sophia (formerly AKI)Kickstarter CampaignOn 8th November 2012 the developers launched a Kickstarter campaign with the aim to raise $75,000 to help fund the completion of the game. Stating the ground work of the game and engine is already done, the money would be used mainly to improve the art and animations for the game.More information can be found on the projects page. The campaign failed to reach its target, only reaching $21,207 by its 7th December deadline. The developer has since released the first version of the game, Uprising, with hope that money raised from selling the game with future updates will fund the rest of the project.
